abstract: New York Islanders general manager Garth Snow aims to build roster this off season around center John Tavares, team's captain and best player.

headline.print_headline: Islanders’ G.M. Ponders Era of Change
headline.main: Islanders’ General Manager Ponders Roster Moves Amid a Shift in Ownership

snippet: The longtime executive Garth Snow settles into a transition period with a focus on building a supporting cast for the team’s star player.
lead_paragraph: The longtime executive Garth Snow settles into a transition period with a focus on building a supporting cast for the team’s star player.
